website_summaries.verdict: Delivering on both form and function, the Air Jordan 12 Retro may be one of the best performing retro models Jordan Brand has produced. Aside from being aesthetically pleasing, these retro Air Jordans will also provide you with everything you need on the court. It has reliable traction, quality materials, responsive cushioning, excellent lockdown, plenty of support, and a nice fit.Overall, the AJ XII Retro is very well-rounded and can even outperform some of its more modern counterparts.
pros: According to many wearers, the Air Jordan 12 Retro is stylish
It is one of the best looking Air Jordans and can be worn with just about anything
A small number are saying that you just can’t go wrong with these basketball shoes
It is a legit hoop shoe and is one of the most playable models out of the retro Air Jordan collection
These basketball shoes fit like a glove, a few buyers are reporting
A good number are declaring that these Air Jordan basketball shoes are quite durable
They claim that it is built like a tank
Majority of the reviewers are asserting that the Air Jordan Retro XII is the most comfortable model out of all the Air Jordan retros
The shoe’s high-top collar delivers excellent support and lockdown, nearly all testers observe
Several purchasers are pleased with the quality of these retro Jordan basketball shoes
The traction works perfectly fine, some players remark, although occasional wipes are needed when playing on dusty courts
A few users are surprised that these retro Air Jordan basketball shoes feel light during play
cons: Most of the testers report that the Air Jordan 12 Retro takes a while to break in
Like most retros (including the Air Jordan 1 and Air Jordan 11), some reviewers are complaining that the Air Jordan 12 is poorly made
They claim that aside from glue marks, there are other manufacturing defects
Several buyers are claiming that these Air Jordan basketball shoes easily get dirty and are hard to clean

customer_reviews.title: Yes there official
customer_reviews.text: These are the official shoes but I don’t like how Jordan made these shoes so tight if you have a narrow foot there perfect for you I normally wear a 8 I had to go up a 9.5 which was a little to big and I have short fat wide flat feet so if your feet are fat once you break em in you’ll love em I still haven’t got there yet though hope this helped
customer_reviews.author: Fluff

customer_reviews.title: It's lit boyyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: Alright so I'm not a dude, but a young lady lol who wears a size 9.5 in mens sizes. I didn't find my size so I bought size 10 and it fits amazing. The packaging was very well done but I could not stop my savage ways and I viciously tore it open. I must admit that as soon as I opened the box, I nearly fainted. The 12s were laying in there, so mezmerising and authentic. Pictures do not capture all their beauty in my opinion. As I am sitting typing this review on my smart phone, I am also currently picking out a honey moon suite for me and my 12s 😜😘😍
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My Son loved these Nike sneakers. They were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Denise Smith

customer_reviews.title: 100% perfect fit & original
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Jordans 12 for my husband, he wears 10.5 and it fits perfectly. He loves it. Came in original box & brand new. Looks even better in person. Delivery was fast. I will be purchasing more Jordan shoes from Amazon. Excellent... Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I like the style
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, but paying $260.00 is too much for a shoe that nobody can see. Theg are too dark. Nothing stands out.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Hale

customer_reviews.title: very god buy
customer_reviews.text: last pair on the internet for this price at the time I purchased it and they were as clean as the day they were made in that Chinese sweat shop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes run big!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and my son really likes them, but they are too big for him. He has had 3 other pairs of size 13 Jordans and they all fit perfect. He needs a size 12 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa V.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: We looked everywhere for these. Some cites had them for as much as twice your price! We are happy to have found you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The most expensive pair of shoes I ever purchased but it was well worth it to see my daughter's face light up when she unwrapped this gift on Christmas morning. Her favorite pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wow Great Deal On My Jordans
customer_reviews.text: Excellent great price fastest ship and couldnt be happier will buy from again!!!

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Nice kicks, didn't know they ran a lil big should have purchased a size 81/2 but the shoes are perfect 👌

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY DAYS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE SHOES, VERY GOOD LOOKING AND FAST SERVICE, SIMPLY TO ORDER. THE YOUNG MAN THEY ARE FOR IS THRILLED WITH THEM.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers they are everything i expected they were the original Jordan sneakers no fake ones I will definitely purchase another pair in the future thank you guys.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now!
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the price I said this is pocket change to me. Put these on and my skin color began to change from white to black and so I went out the first night of wearing these and girls were literally throwing their panties at me. Needles to say since I bought these shoes my life has greatly improved.
